channel.title: iHaxx Server || Lunar Isle
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape.
Over the past 2 weeks i recently started up my server again (been going since 2006 now). I havn't been around since around 2008 due to having kids and what not. Anyways time to cut to the chase. I'm building a 317 server loading 508+ Maps / Objects / Items/ Npcs Etc.
In addition to iHaxx.Net & iHaxx.Com i've recently purchased LunarIsle.com which i'm thinking of possibly changing the servername to.
Features; Multi Cannon Sexy Web Client Online Store New Fresh HighScores Runescape message centre So much fucking more ?
Media; * * * * Home Place Map [IMG]http://ihaxx.net/play/map/icons.png[/img] [IMG]http://ihaxx.net/play/map/home.png[/img]
If anyone is wondering, i am hiring staff mainly a developer (only one) don't bug me if your 12 years old and have no knowledge of java (e.g OMG I KNOW HOW TO MOVE OBJECTS).
If your intrested in that position i can be contacted on here via personal message.
Kind Regards, Elux

@Elux wrote:

I will try and get verified first, and i’m still making the images for my thread.

Regards,
Elux
